Hi tmrv, you are doing it wrong.
In AND / OR group, logical operator apply to INNERÂ rules. So a logical group with only one rule, mean no group at all.
You should write :

Start AND
msiar
Start OR
    lar Not
        FileExists
    lar Not
    lar Not
        FileExists
    lar Not
